name: dscanner
description: Swiss-army knife for D source code
preGenerateCommands: rdmd --eval='auto dir=environment.get(`DUB_PACKAGE_DIR`); dir.buildPath(`bin`).mkdirRecurse; auto gitVer = (`git -C `~dir~` describe --tags`).executeShell; (gitVer.status == 0 ? gitVer.output : dir.dirName.baseName.findSplitAfter(environment.get(`DUB_ROOT_PACKAGE`)~`-`)[1]).ifThrown(`0.0.0`).toFile(dir.buildPath(`bin`, `dubhash.txt`));'
